# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

```julia
function wrap_string(text::String, text_width::Int=10)
    words = split(text)
    wrapped_text = words[1]
    
    for i = 2:length(words)
        if length(wrapped_text) + length(words[i]) + 1 > text_width
            wrapped_text = string(wrapped_text, "\n", words[i])
        else
            wrapped_text = string(wrapped_text, " ", words[i])
        end
    end
    
    return wrapped_text
end

text = "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua."

println(wrap_string(text))
```
